message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and expectations. Given its high-quality features and unique benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $10,000 to you. Considering its intrinsic value and the effort put into its creation, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to providing unparalleled value to our esteemed clients. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to enhance your experience with our product.
